name: Juha The Unemployed
description:
A magical RPG adventure of Juha Sipilä the former prime minister of Finland! Guide Juha after series of unfortunate events that led Juha to be fired from the Finnish parliament. Learn to be respectable citizen and simulate the experience: what is it like to be an unemployed person? How do you cope in this hectic world when you don't have an income? How will you survive? Play and find out!

****

Movement
Arrow keys, enter + mouse

****

How to play:

Unzip Maker4D.zip
navigate to the Maker 4D folder
Open Maker4_64bit.exe (if on Windows, Linux / Android builds also available)

****

Made entirely with Maker4D program:
http://maker4d.uw.hu/

You can replace all the files in the data folder to build your own game on top of "Juha The Unemployed"


Made by forces aka Joonas Siren
